name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Republican members of the U.S. House of Representatives are drafting a bill that may revoke China's permanent normal trade relations status.
The Chinese Foreign Ministry responded: The United States granted China permanent normal trade relations status in 2001. Some U.S. politicians are trying to reverse history and violate WTO rules. We urge relevant U.S. lawmakers to abide by WTO rules and stop their words and deeds that harm others and do not benefit themselves.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 9, Dazhu County, Sichuan. It was revealed online that Dazhu Middle School has strict management of students, with students having only 40 minutes for lunch and not being allowed to leave school in the afternoon. A series of regulations caused dissatisfaction among students and collective protests. Students wrote on paper, "Fight, students of Dazhu Middle School, against autocratic rule"
Some students waved the party flag in the corridor to vent their dissatisfaction.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizens roughly counted the approximate locations of the victims of the Zhuhai Sports Center collision based on tonight's video.
At least 38 people were hit.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A netizen marked the location of the injured on the map.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Currently, searching for "Zhuhai Sports Center car hits people" on Kuaishou and selecting the release time within one day shows no relevant content. 
Searching on Douyin only has a few results, but no live video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Sources said Trump will choose U.S. Senator Marco Rubio as Secretary of State. Rubio has advocated a tough foreign policy against the United States' geopolitical enemies, including China, Iran, Cuba and other countries, for many years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 11 (Release) "Self-imposed Hardship Learning and Practice Base" in Shijiazhuang, Hebei

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 12, the Consulate General of Japan in Guangzhou issued a warning about the Zhuhai collision incident: Recently, many vicious incidents have occurred in China. When talking with Chinese people, respect local customs and habits, pay attention to the surrounding environment and words and deeds. Avoid going out alone at night, and be careful even during the day. Don't speak loudly in Japanese. Pay attention to the surrounding environment when going out, especially in places where people gather, such as squares.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 12, a video of an explosion at Zhuhai Stadium was circulated online. In the video, a number of cars outside a restaurant were blown away.
After verification, the location was a restaurant on the third floor of Shuikou Sanitary Ware Expo City in Kaiping, Jiangmen City, which had not been open for a long time.
Earlier, the Jiangmen government responded that it was a film and television drama shooting.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 12, the Zhuhai Air Show security inspection site.
Security personnel carefully inspected each car.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 12 (Released) Hebei. A blogger said that Zhang Weiwei said that China has already achieved a clear lead in many fields.
But taking artificial intelligence as an example, the strongest intelligent chip is undoubtedly NVIDIA, and natural language processing is led by OpenAI. Our large model products were actually followed after OpenAI became popular, but why do some people still support Zhang Weiwei without thinking? I think it is because the butt determines the brain, and emotions precede thinking.
